Record.definition: CREATE OR REPLACE EDITIONABLE PROCEDURE "PPM"."SP_DDDW_CLNTCODE_CREDITMEMO" ( RESOURCE_CODE VARCHAR2 , in_arg1 IN VARCHAR2 DEFAULT NULL, rowcount NUMBER , bill_or_match VARCHAR2 DEFAULT 'B', RC1 IN OUT SP_DDDW_CLNTCODE_CREDITMEMOPkg.RCT1) AS arg1 GLOBALPKG.STRING; StoO_selcnt INTEGER; StoO_error INTEGER; StoO_rowcnt INTEGER; StoO_crowcnt INTEGER := 0; StoO_fetchstatus INTEGER := 0; StoO_errmsg GLOBALPKG.STRING; StoO_sqlstatus INTEGER; pos NUMBER(3,0); getname NUMBER(1,0); BEGIN /* Called From: Procedure :- Trigger :- PMD TransactionId :- WMD ActionId :- Modified By : Tarun Modified Date : 07/25/2001 */ sp_dddw_clntcode_creditmemo.arg1 := sp_dddw_clntcode_creditmemo.in_arg1; IF sp_dddw_clntcode_creditmemo.rowcount = 50 THEN NULL; ELSE IF sp_dddw_clntcode_creditmemo.rowcount = 100 THEN NULL; ELSE IF sp_dddw_clntcode_creditmemo.rowcount = 200 THEN NULL; END IF; END IF; END IF; IF sp_dddw_clntcode_creditmemo.bill_or_match = 'B' THEN BEGIN IF NVL(sp_dddw_clntcode_creditmemo.arg1, '') IS NULL THEN OPEN RC1 FOR SELECT clntsupp.COMPANY_CODE, clntsupp.COMPANY_NAME FROM clntsupp WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM invoiceheader WHERE invoiceheader.COMPANY_CODE = clntsupp.COMPANY_CODE AND invoiceheader.status = '0' AND invoiceheader.invtype = 'I' ) AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM projstaff WHERE projstaff.COMPANY_CODE = clntsupp.COMPANY_CODE AND projstaff.billingaccess = 1 AND projstaff.RESOURCE_CODE = sp_dddw_clntcode_creditmemo.RESOURCE_CODE ); ELSE IF INSTR( sp_dddw_clntcode_creditmemo.arg1, '|') > 0 THEN BEGIN IF INSTR( sp_dddw_clntcode_creditmemo.arg1, '~') > 0 THEN sp_dddw_clntcode_creditmemo.getname := 1; ELSE sp_dddw_clntcode_creditmemo.getname := 0; END IF; sp_dddw_clntcode_creditmemo.pos := INSTR( sp_dddw_clntcode_creditmemo.arg1, '|'); sp_dddw_clntcode_creditmemo.arg1 := SUBSTR(sp_dddw_clntcode_creditmemo.arg1, 1, sp_dddw_clntcode_creditmemo.pos - 1); IF sp_dddw_clntcode_creditmemo.getname = 0 THEN BEGIN OPEN RC1 FOR SELECT clntsupp.COMPANY_CODE, clntsupp.COMPANY_NAME FROM clntsupp WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM invoiceheader WHERE invoiceheader.COMPANY_CODE = clntsupp.COMPANY_CODE AND invoiceheader.status = '0' AND invoiceheader.invtype = 'I' ) AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM projstaff WHERE projstaff.COMPANY_CODE = clntsupp.COMPANY_CODE AND projstaff.billingaccess = 1 AND projstaff.RESOURCE_CODE = sp_dddw_clntcode_creditmemo.RESOURCE_CODE ) AND clntsupp.COMPANY_CODE >= sp_dddw_clntcode_creditmemo.arg1 ORDER BY 1 ; END; ELSE BEGIN OPEN RC1 FOR SELECT clntsupp.COMPANY_CODE, clntsupp.COMPANY_NAME FROM clntsupp WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM invoiceheader WHERE invoiceheader.COMPANY_CODE = clntsupp.COMPANY_CODE AND invoiceheader.status = '0' AND invoiceheader.invtype = 'I' ) AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM projstaff WHERE projstaff.COMPANY_CODE = clntsupp.COMPANY_CODE AND projstaff.billingaccess = 1 AND projstaff.RESOURCE_CODE = sp_dddw_clntcode_creditmemo.RESOURCE_CODE ) AND clntsupp.COMPANY_NAME >= sp_dddw_clntcode_creditmemo.arg1 ORDER BY 2 ; END; END IF; END; ELSE OPEN RC1 FOR SELECT clntsupp.COMPANY_CODE, clntsupp.COMPANY_NAME FROM clntsupp WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM invoiceheader WHERE invoiceheader.COMPANY_CODE = clntsupp.COMPANY_CODE AND invoiceheader.status = '0' AND invoiceheader.invtype = 'I' ) AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM projstaff WHERE projstaff.COMPANY_CODE = clntsupp.COMPANY_CODE AND projstaff.billingaccess = 1 AND projstaff.RESOURCE_CODE = sp_dddw_clntcode_creditmemo.RESOURCE_CODE ) AND clntsupp.COMPANY_CODE = sp_dddw_clntcode_creditmemo.arg1; END IF; END IF; END; ELSE BEGIN IF NVL(sp_dddw_clntcode_creditmemo.arg1, '') IS NULL THEN OPEN RC1 FOR SELECT clntsupp.COMPANY_CODE, clntsupp.COMPANY_NAME FROM clntsupp WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM invoiceheader WHERE invoiceheader.COMPANY_CODE = clntsupp.COMPANY_CODE AND invoiceheader.status = '9' AND invoiceheader.invtype = 'I' AND SUBSTR(invoiceheader.invoiceno, 1, 5) = 'MATCH' ) AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM projstaff WHERE projstaff.COMPANY_CODE = clntsupp.COMPANY_CODE AND projstaff.billingaccess = 1 AND projstaff.RESOURCE_CODE = sp_dddw_clntcode_creditmemo.RESOURCE_CODE ); ELSE IF INSTR( sp_dddw_clntcode_creditmemo.arg1, '|') > 0 THEN BEGIN IF INSTR( sp_dddw_clntcode_creditmemo.arg1, '~') > 0 THEN sp_dddw_clntcode_creditmemo.getname := 1; ELSE sp_dddw_clntcode_creditmemo.getname := 0; END IF; sp_dddw_clntcode_creditmemo.pos := INSTR( sp_dddw_clntcode_creditmemo.arg1, '|'); sp_dddw_clntcode_creditmemo.arg1 := SUBSTR(sp_dddw_clntcode_creditmemo.arg1, 1, sp_dddw_clntcode_creditmemo.pos - 1); IF sp_dddw_clntcode_creditmemo.getname = 0 THEN BEGIN OPEN RC1 FOR SELECT clntsupp.COMPANY_CODE, clntsupp.COMPANY_NAME FROM clntsupp WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM invoiceheader WHERE invoiceheader.COMPANY_CODE = clntsupp.COMPANY_CODE AND invoiceheader.status = '9' AND invoiceheader.invtype = 'I' AND SUBSTR(invoiceheader.invoiceno, 1, 5) = 'MATCH' ) AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM projstaff WHERE projstaff.COMPANY_CODE = clntsupp.COMPANY_CODE AND projstaff.billingaccess = 1 AND projstaff.RESOURCE_CODE = sp_dddw_clntcode_creditmemo.RESOURCE_CODE ) AND clntsupp.COMPANY_CODE >= sp_dddw_clntcode_creditmemo.arg1 ORDER BY 1 ; END; ELSE BEGIN OPEN RC1 FOR SELECT clntsupp.COMPANY_CODE, clntsupp.COMPANY_NAME FROM clntsupp WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM invoiceheader WHERE invoiceheader.COMPANY_CODE = clntsupp.COMPANY_CODE AND invoiceheader.status = '9' AND invoiceheader.invtype = 'I' AND SUBSTR(invoiceheader.invoiceno, 1, 5) = 'MATCH' ) AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM projstaff WHERE projstaff.COMPANY_CODE = clntsupp.COMPANY_CODE AND projstaff.billingaccess = 1 AND projstaff.RESOURCE_CODE = sp_dddw_clntcode_creditmemo.RESOURCE_CODE ) AND clntsupp.COMPANY_NAME >= sp_dddw_clntcode_creditmemo.arg1 ORDER BY 2 ; END; END IF; END; ELSE OPEN RC1 FOR SELECT clntsupp.COMPANY_CODE, clntsupp.COMPANY_NAME FROM clntsupp WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM invoiceheader WHERE invoiceheader.COMPANY_CODE = clntsupp.COMPANY_CODE AND invoiceheader.status = '9' AND invoiceheader.invtype = 'I' AND SUBSTR(invoiceheader.invoiceno, 1, 5) = 'MATCH' ) AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM projstaff WHERE projstaff.COMPANY_CODE = clntsupp.COMPANY_CODE AND projstaff.billingaccess = 1 AND projstaff.RESOURCE_CODE = sp_dddw_clntcode_creditmemo.RESOURCE_CODE ) AND clntsupp.COMPANY_CODE = sp_dddw_clntcode_creditmemo.arg1; END IF; END IF; END; END IF; END sp_dddw_clntcode_creditmemo;
